C

calcScores() - Method in class LowerSection
Method that calculates the lower section scores for the current hand.

G

getLength() - Method in class LowerSection
Method that returns the length of the upper section
getLowerScore() - Method in class LowerSection
Method that gives the score of the lower section
getScore(int) - Method in class LowerSection
Method that gives the score at the desired line

L

LowerSection - Class in <Unnamed>
This class computes and stores the values for the lower section of a score sheet in a game of Yahtzee.
LowerSection(Hand, Config) - Constructor for class LowerSection
Constructor that creates a new LowerSection object and uses the given Hand and Config objects to calculate and store the players' scores.

P

printLowerScore() - Method in class LowerSection
Method that prints the score of the lower section

S

setScore(int, int) - Method in class LowerSection
Method that sets the score for a specific line of the upper section.
